Dear {!Contact.Name},
I'm the Assistant for the VinPro Department at VinSolutions and would like to get your feedback on how effective our Plan of Action was in resolving your concerns. We had previously sent you a survey to gather your feedback on your recent plan of action .Our records indicate that you have not completed this survey. Please take the time to complete the survey previously sent or you may call/email me to complete. The survey is only 5 short questions that will help us improve our customer service and procedures in the future.
If you prefer to schedule a specific time, please email the date/time and your preferred number, that you would like me to contact you to complete these questions.
Thank you for your time and we look forward to your feedback.
Sincerely, Kim Darrah Account Performance Assistant VinSolutions.com kim.darrah@vinsolutions.com 800-980-7488 x190
